name: Break Time (Eduardo Muro, colleenekat, Mnamna, Celtican)
name_original: Break Time (Eduardo Muro, colleenekat, Mnamna, Celtican)
description:
Break Time! It's a satirical corporate beat 'em up with a destructible environment!

This is the alpha version of our project. Enter the office dungeon, defeat the drones, face the overlord, and demolish the corporate empire!

  Controls:

  • Left/right arrows to move (or A/D)
  • Up arrow to jump (or W/Space)
  • Right mouse button to interact: open doors, heal at the water cooler, pick up items, throw held items

 Hope you enjoy our game! 

 Please fill out this short survey so we can make this game more awesome!
